function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Urban dwellings with multiple family members","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission due to close proximity of individuals","Mitigation":"Establishing strict hygiene and ventilation protocols, reducing the number of occupants per dwelling","Technologies":"Air purifiers, smart ventilation systems","People":"Families living in urban dwellings","Owner":"Local authorities, building management companies"},{"Description":"Low level of perceived dedication to care of children and dependents","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of children and dependents to neglect and lack of supervision","Mitigation":"Providing support services for families, promoting community-based care initiatives","Technologies":"Online monitoring systems, community care platforms","People":"Children and dependents in the households","Owner":"Government agencies, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of space and resources for leisure and sports activities","Impact":"Negative impact on mental and physical well-being, leading to higher stress levels and reduced physical activity","Mitigation":"Providing guidance for indoor exercises, facilitating access to outdoor recreational areas","Technologies":"Virtual fitness programs, health and fitness apps","People":"Residents in urban dwellings","Owner":"Local government, property developers"}]}
